name: sporeas
description: To help sermon speakers get their message across by projecting sermon titles and bible verses to help the listener follow along, in hopes that they can get the most out of the messages on the pulpit.

scripts.reminder:
echo; echo 'Reminders: 
Did you run tests or linters first? 

 \033[1;34mnpm run lint:py\033[0m
 \033[1;34mnpm run lint:js\033[0m
 \033[1;34mnpm run lint\033[0m
 \033[1;34mnpm run test-visually\033[0m
 \033[1;34mnpm run test\033[0m

If you want to prevent bad commits, remove the # from the husky pre-commit hook.'; echo;
scripts.prevent-commit-if-fail-tests: if (npm run lint && npm test); then (echo 'All tests passed.'); else (exit 1); fi;
scripts.test: python3.7 basic_app.py & selenium-side-runner -c "goog:chromeOptions.args=[--headless,--nogpu] browserName=chrome" Sporeas-test.side; (pkill -f basic_app.py) || true;
scripts.test-visually: python3.7 basic_app.py & selenium-side-runner Sporeas-test.side; (pkill -f basic_app.py) || true;
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js; npm run lint:py;

hooks.pre-commit: npm run reminder; # npm run prevent-commit-if-fail-tests;
